ns0:DescribedValueSet.ns0:Purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent a diagnosis of septic shock.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use Quality Data Model (QDM) category related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated with a diagnosis of septic shock.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
